title: Bug 4329 - No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned. The issue occurs in the 1GLDN1X module.
OB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the search results. The search should first try to get the Java element and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view in the 1GLDN1X module.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the search dialog.
4. Enter a search query for declarations.
5. Click on the search button.

Expected result: The search dialog should display the search results.

Notes:
